channel.title: Photos on Learning CFEngine 3
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on Learning CFEngine 3

item.title: A full shelf
item.description: I got this photo of a bookshelf at the CFEngine office in Palo Alto. Looks awesome, doesn't it? :)

item.title: My first batch of print books arrived
item.description: I'm visiting Purdue University today to give a talk and to visit old friends and colleagues. And the first box of books arrived here! It's incredible to have the physical book in my hand. This is the building where I spent most of my grad school years.
